name: Grumpy days
description:
This game is a Gamerella Game Jam 2022 entry.

The theme for the jam was: Masquerade.

Made by IrisRai and me.

Some days are just not good days. Some days we want to walk around and pick fights with everybody, but we pretend we're alright and it's hard. So we made a game about that feeling. Help grumpy Jo get home after a long day. Oh and Jo really likes cola.
